title: The eligibility of the Non Protected occupiers shall be decided by the Competent Officers as per the orders issued by the Government in this behalf from time to time
clause_text: The eligibility of the Non Protected occupiers shall be decided by the Competent Officers as per the orders issued by the Government in this behalf from time to time.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE NON PROTECTED OCCUPIERS
